Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct Dial Phone, Safe box, Stereo Hi-Fi, Radio, Daily maid Service, Fridge & coffee machine, Living room, Safe Deposit Box. Business Facilities, Dry cleaning, Laundry, Room Service, 24h Reception, Baby Sitting, Limo SVC. Conference room capacity: 300pax. Opened : 1994

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Ideally located, within just 20 min car-ride from Athens international airport, half an hour from Athens Historical centre,5 min from Glyfada’s shopping centre and right in the middle of the Athenian seaside entertainment zone. Two exclusive beaches, “Alkyoni” and “Astreria Beach”, offering water sports and amusement facilities, are situated only within a short walk distance from the hotel’s own swimming pool.
